Valāhaka Sutta：1．Valāhaka Sutta．There are four kinds of rain clouds：those which produce thunder but no rain； those which produce rain but，no thunder； those which produce neither； those which produce both．There are four similar kinds of persons：those that speak but do not act； those that act but do not speak； those that do neither； and those that do both．A．ii．102．

2．Valāhaka Sutta．There are four kinds of rain-clouds （as above） and four kinds of people：those that know the Dhamma but do not understand it； those that do not know it but understand it； those that do neither； those that do both．A．ii．103．
